entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
